trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> objekter i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the GridColumnStylesCollection through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: På den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, du har tilgang til GridColumnStylesCollection via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: The GridColumnStylesCollection uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
trans-unit.target: GridColumnStylesCollection bruker standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A>metoder for å endre samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>metode for å finne ut om en bestemt egenskapsverdi finnes i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden for å bestemme indeksen for noen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekt i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the GridColumnStylesCollection before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Opprett alltid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter, og Legg dem til GridColumnStylesCollection før du legger til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objekter til <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Når du legger til en tom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>med en gyldig <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdien i samlingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter som genereres automatisk for deg.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the GridColumnStylesCollection.
trans-unit.target: Derfor vil bli utløst et unntak hvis du prøver å legge til nye <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objekter med dupliserte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>verdier i GridColumnStylesCollection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Adds a column style to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en kolonnestil i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The index of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den nye <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en matrise av kolonnen stil objekter i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> objekter for å legge til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner samlingen av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change is made to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en endring er gjort i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
trans-unit.target: Sende den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A>for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>til å returnere den <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>for en angitt kolonne.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> med det angitte navnet.

trans-unit.source: The column header of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> can be set explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Kolonneoverskriften i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>kan angis eksplisitt ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> is set using uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>angis ved hjelp av bruker <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The comparison between column headers and the value to look for is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligningen mellom kolonneoverskrifter og verdien for å se etter skiller.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> til å hente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName*>

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"> </xref> med den angitte kolonneoverskriften.

trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>metode for å finne ut indeksen for et element i samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for each column style in the collection to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> for hver kolonne mal i samlingen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer samlingen til en kompatibel endimensjonal <xref:System.Array>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen på Målmatrisen.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from collection.
trans-unit.target: Den endimensjonal <xref:System.Array>som er målet for elementene kopieres fra samlingen.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Matrisen må ha nullbasert indeksering.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Starter den nullbaserte indeksen i matrisen på som kopiering.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn null.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayer flerdimensjonal.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - eller - antallet elementer i den er større enn den tilgjengelige plassen fra index til slutten av array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
trans-unit.target: Typen for den automatisk kan ikke endres til typen array .

trans-unit.target: Henter antallet elementer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Antallet elementer i samlingen.
